headline.main: Allies, by Air and Sea, Sink 16 Ships in Mediterranean; ALLIES BAG 16 SHIPS IN MEDITERRANEAN AXIS SHIPPING IN MEDITERRANEAN HARD HIT

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, May 1 -- Slashing through a protective umbrella of enemy aircraft, Allied planes sank at least a half dozen enemy ships bearing men and supplies to Tunisia yesterday. One of the ships sunk was a de stroyer. An Italian light cruiser was left in flames as bomb-hits were scored on eight vessels.
